H0.text: What is the opposite side from starboard on a ship. Left

H1.text: What is the opposite side from starboard on a ship. Larboard

H2.text: What is the opposite side from starboard on a ship. Aft

H3.text: What is the opposite side from starboard on a ship. Port

A4.text: Port side is the side to the left of an observer aboard the vessel and facing the bow, towards the direction the vessel is heading when underway in the forward direction.

A5.text: The starboard side is to the right of an observer aboard the vessel and facing the bow.
